nodes.text: Marmoth was a planet located in the Albarrio sector of the Outer Rim Territories, and was a part of the Relgim Run. It was one of the ports of call of the luxury liner Kuari Princess.
Marmoth was explored sometime between 1000 BBY and 25 BBY.
BY 25 ABY, Marmoth boasted a population of 1 million to 10 million sentients.
